technical-data.invention-title: Produktspender zur Abgabe eines länglichen Produktstreifens
Product dispenser for dispensing an elongate product strip
Distributeur de produits pour distribuer une bande de produit allongée

address.street: ZAC des Barbanniers 1 avenue du Général de Gaulle "Le Signac"

description.p: This invention relates to a product dispenser for dispensing an elongate product strip.
Prior art product dispensers are for example known from WO 2010/046921 A2, US 4,941,598 and US 2,942,762.

Certain products, such as certain skincare creams and lotions, are better applied when they are applied as elongate strips rather than as a single dose that then has to be spread out over the area to be treated using a tool or with fingers. This, for example, would enable the desired area on a person's body to be neatly covered in a single, controlled movement.

The aim of the present invention is therefore to provide a product dispenser for dispensing an elongate product strip. In particular, the product dispenser aims to allow the even distribution of a strip of product that is uniform both in thickness and in width in a controlled manner.
According to the invention there is provided a product dispenser according to claim 1.
In an embodiment, the reservoir is substantially elongate, and is positioned substantially parallel to the elongate distribution slit of the dispensing cover.
In an embodiment, the product container comprises a spout that defines the container opening, the product flow regulator being securable to the spout of the product container.

In an embodiment, the product flow regulator comprises:
a skirt extending from the conduit, proximate the first end of the conduit, the skirt and spout comprising complementary securing formations to enable the skirt, and thus the product flow regulator, to be secured to the spout of the product container; and
In an embodiment, the dispensing cover and the skirt comprise complementary securing formations to enable the dispensing cover to be secured to the product flow regulator.

In an embodiment, proximate the elongate distribution slit, the dispensing cover comprises a rectangular guide wall that can be snugly accommodated within the rectangular bowl portion of the product flow regulator, thereby guiding the flow of product from the reservoir through the elongate distribution slit.
In an embodiment, the product container comprises a flexible wall container such as a tube.
Alternatively, the product container may comprise a rigid wall container fitted with a dispensing mechanism.
In an embodiment, the product dispenser is arranged to dispense an elongate product strip having a length of approximately between 2.5 and 3 cm.
In an embodiment, the product dispenser comprises a cap that is releasably fittable to the dispensing cover.

shows a perspective view of the product dispenser shown in Figure 1 in an assembled configuration, except for a cap that is shown separated from the product dispenser;
shows a perspective view of the product dispenser in use, namely dispensing an elongate product strip;
show side-by-side, exploded, cross-sectional side and front views, respectively, of an upper portion of the product dispenser of the invention;
show assembled, cross-sectional side and front views, respectively, of an upper portion of the product dispenser of the invention;
show assembled, cross-sectional side and front views, respectively, of the product dispenser of the invention; and
show perspective views of alternative embodiments of the product dispenser of the invention.

description.p: Referring first to Figures 1 to 9, a product dispenser 10 for dispensing an elongate product strip 12, as best shown in Figure 3, is shown. The product dispenser 10 comprises a product container 14 for storing the product to be dispensed, with the container 14 defining an opening 16 through which the product 12 can exit the container 14.
In a configuration, the product container 14 terminates in a spout 18 that projects from a shoulder portion 20 of the product container 14, the spout defining the container opening 16.

In the illustrated configuration, the product container 14 comprises a flexible wall container such as a tube. Alternatively, however, the product container 14 may comprise a rigid wall container fitted with a dispensing mechanism to dispense the product within the container 14.

As best shown in Figures 1 and 4 to 9, the product dispenser 10 further comprises a product flow regulator 22 that can be secured to the product container 14, and in particular to the spout 18 of the container 14, so as to be located proximate the container opening 16. With particular reference to Figures 4 to 7, the product flow regulator 22 comprises a flow passage 24 that is in communication with the product container 14. The flow passage 24 accommodates the product 12 exiting the container 14, with the product flow regulator 22 terminating in a plurality of central distribution apertures 26 for allowing the product 12 within the flow passage 24 to exit the product flow regulator 22.

In particular, the product flow regulator 22 comprises a conduit 28 that defines the flow passage 24. The conduit 28, in turn, comprises a first, open end 30 snugly fitted within the spout 18 of the product container 14 to receive product exiting the container 14, and a second end 32 in which the distribution apertures 26 are defined.

A skirt 34 extends from the conduit 28, proximate the first end 30 of the conduit 28. The skirt 34 and spout 18 comprise complementary securing snap fit formations 36 to enable the skirt 34, and thus the product flow regulator 22, to be secured to the spout 18 of the product container 14.

A rectangular bowl portion 38 extends from the conduit 28, proximate the second end 32 of the conduit 28. The bowl portion 38 defines a reservoir 40 for accommodating the product 12 exiting the product flow regulator 22 through the distribution apertures 26.

The product dispenser 10 further comprises a dispensing cover 42 that overlies the product flow regulator 22. The dispensing cover 42 defines a central elongate distribution slit 44 proximate the reservoir 40 of the product flow regulator 22. This arrangement allows an elongate product strip 12 to be dispensed, as best shown in Figure 3.

In an embodiment, the elongate distribution slit 44 is defined within an elongate recess 46 defined in the dispensing cover 42. Conveniently, the reservoir 40 is substantially elongate, and is positioned substantially parallel to the elongate distribution slit 44 of the dispensing cover 42. This arrangement allows product to flow and accumulate into the reservoir 40 in a controlled manner. In particular, the product flow regulator 22 controls the flow of product towards the slit 44, and the shape and positioning of the distribution slit 44 relative to the reservoir 40 (i.e. that they are essentially parallel to each other) further controls and regulates the dispensing of the product 12.

In particular, the pattern of product flow creates a pressure gradient in the reservoir 40, which allows the reservoir 40 to fill completely before the product is dispensed through the slit 44. As the product enters the reservoir 40, it will accumulate around the distribution apertures 26 in regions of relatively high product pressure, but eventually, as the product 12 moves to regions within the reservoir 40 of relatively lower pressure, it will distribute evenly in the reservoir 40 before exiting through the slit 44. Advantageously, in this regard, the apertures 26 face sideways or downwards towards the base of the bowl portion 38, and not upwards towards the slit 44. This arrangement ensures that the reservoir 40 is filled completely before the product is dispensed through the slit 44. The result is that the pressure becomes essentially even across the entire length of the slit 44, thereby ensuring an even flow of an essentially constant rate of product. As a user of the product dispenser 10 draws the device across the portion of the body to be treated, an elongate strip of product is hence formed. An essentially constant pressure, and hence constant flow rate along the length of the slit 44, leads to the formation of a strip 12 of essentially uniform thickness.

The thickness of the dispensed product strip 12 also depends upon the pressure applied by the user to the product container 14 (either directly in the case of the container 14 taking the form of a flexible tube or via the dispensing mechanism in the case of the container 24 taking the form of a rigid wall container). A further factor affecting the thickness of the dispensed product strip 12 is the viscosity of the product 12. Thus, to summarise, the thickness of the strip 12 is defined by the speed at which the user draws the product dispenser 10 over the zone to be treated, the pressure applied by the user to the product container 14, and the viscosity of the product 12. Thus, for example, for a given applied pressure and viscosity, the slower the movement of the product dispenser 10 the thicker the strip, and vice versa. Similarly, for a given speed of movement and viscosity, the greater the applied pressure to the container 14, the thicker the strip, and vice versa. However, the strip width is defined by the geometry of the slit 44, which remains constant irrespective of the pressure applied or the speed of movement defined by the user.
In a configuration, the dispensing cover 42 and the skirt 34 comprise complementary securing snap fit formations 48 to enable the dispensing cover 42 to be secured to the product flow regulator 22.

Proximate the elongate distribution slit 44, the dispensing cover 42 comprises a rectangular guide wall 50 that can be snugly accommodated within the rectangular bowl portion 38 of the product flow regulator 22, as best shown in Figures 6 to 9, thereby guiding the flow of product 12 from the reservoir 40 through the elongate distribution slit 44.
A cap 52 may be provided that is releasably fittable to the dispensing cover 42, again typically using snap fit formations 54.

In a configuration, the product dispenser 10 is arranged to dispense an elongate product strip 12 having a length of approximately between 2.5 and 3 cm, with the product typically having a viscosity of between 83 100 to 155 700 mPA.s and a restitution rate of between 90%-96% (but this does depend on the product's viscosity).

Turning now to Figures 10 to 16, with alternative configurations of the product dispenser of the invention. For example, the elongate distribution slit 44 may be relatively wide (as indicated by numeral 44.1 in Figure 10) or relatively narrow (as indicated by numeral 44.2 in Figure 11). In one version, the distribution slit 44, although elongate, may be wavy, as indicated by numeral 44.3 in Figure 12. In adddition, the slit 44 may be defined off-centre to facilitate application of the dispensed product, as shown in Figures 13 and 14, with Figure 13 showing a relatively wider slit 44.4 and Figure 14 a relatively narrower slit 44.5.
The present invention thus provides a product dispenser for dispensing an elongate product strip in a controlled manner and having an even distribution of product.

claim.claim-text: Ein Produktspender (10) zum Spenden eines länglichen Produktstreifens (12), wobei der Produktspender umfasst: einen Produktbehälter (14) zum Lagern des Produkts, das gespendet wird, wobei der Behälter eine Öffnung definiert, durch welche das Produkt den Behälter verlassen kann; einen Produktflussregler (22) benachbart der Behälteröffnung, wobei der Produktflussregler einen Flusskanal, der in Verbindung mit dem Produktbehälter steht, umfasst, wobei der Flusskanal das Produkt beherbergt, das den Behälter verlässt, der Produktflussregler in mindestens einer Verteileröffnung endet, um es dem Produkt innerhalb des Flusskanals zu ermöglichen den Produktflussregler zu verlassen, wobei der Produktflussregler ferner ein Reservoir zum Beherbergen des Produkts, das den Produktflussregulator verlässt, umfasst; wobei der Produktflussregler umfasst eine Leitung (28), die den Flusskanal definiert, wobei die Leitung ein erstes offenes Ende umfasst, das passend in die Tülle des Produktbehälters angepasst ist, um das Produkt, das den Behälter verlässt zu empfangen und ein zweites Ende, in welchem die mindestens eine Verteileröffnung definiert ist; einen Behälterbereich (38), der sich von der Leitung erstreckt, benachbart zu dem zweiten Ende der Leitung, wobei der Behälterbereich das Reservoir zum Beherbergen des Produkts definiert, das den Produktflussregler durch die mindestens eine Verteileröffnung verlässt, und eine Spenderabdeckung (42), die über dem Produktflussregler liegt, wobei die Spenderabdeckung einen länglichen Verteilerschlitz benachbart dem Reservoir des Produktflussreglers definiert, um einen länglichen Produktstreifen, der gespendet wird, zu ermöglichen, dadurch gekennzeichnet, dass der Behälterbereich ein rechteckiger Behälterbereich ist und dass die mindestens eine Verteileröffnungfläche seitlich oder nach unten zu der Basis des Behälterbereichs liegt, dabei sicherstellen, dass das Reservoir komplett gefüllt ist, bevor das Produkt durch den länglichen Verteilerschlitz gespendet wird.
Der Produktspender gemäß Anspruch 1, wobei das Reservoir im Wesentlichen länglich ist und im Wesentlichen parallel zu dem länglichen Verteilerschlitz der Spenderabdeckung angeordnet ist.

Der Produktspender von entweder Anspruch 1 oder Anspruch 2, wobei der Produktbehälter eine Tülle (18) umfasst, die die Behälteröffnung definiert, wobei der Produktflussregler zu der Tülle des Produktbehälters verschließbar ist.

Der Produktspender gemäß Anspruch 1, wobei der Produktflussregler ferner eine Leiste (34) umfasst, die sich von der Leitung erstreckt, benachbart zu dem ersten Ende der Leitung, wobei die Leiste und Tülle komplementäre Sicherungsgebilde umfassen, um es der Leiste und folglich dem Produktflussregler zu ermöglichen an der Tülle des Produktbehälters befestigt zu sein.

Der Produktspender gemäß Anspruch 4, wobei die Spenderabdeckung und die Leiste komplementäre Sicherungsgebilde (38) umfassen, um es der Spenderabdeckung zu ermöglichen am Produktflussregler befestigt zu sein.

Der Produktspender gemäß Anspruch 1, wobei benachbart dem länglichen Verteilerschlitz die Spenderabdeckung eine rechteckige Führungswand umfasst, die passend in dem rechteckigen Behälterbereich des Produktflussregler beherbergt sein kann, um so den Fluss des Produktes von dem Reservoir durch den länglichen Verteilerschlitz zu leiten.
Der Produktspender gemäß einem der vorherigen Ansprüche, wobei der Produktbehälter einen Behälter mit flexibler Wand, wie zum Beispiel eine Tube, umfasst.
Der Produktspender gemäß einem der vorherigen Ansprüche 1 bis 6, wobei der Produktbehälter einen Behälter mit starrer Wand umfassen kann, der mit einem Spendermechanismus ausgestattet ist.
Der Produktspender gemäß einem der vorherigen Ansprüche, wobei der Produktspender eine Kappe (52) umfasst, die lösbar zu der Spenderabdeckung anbringbar ist.

A product dispenser (10) for dispensing an elongate product strip (12), the product dispenser comprising: a product container (14) for storing the product to be dispensed, the container defining an opening through which the product can exit the container; a product flow regulator (22) proximate the container opening, the product flow regulator comprising a flow passage that is in communication with the product container, the flow passage accommodating the product exiting the container, the product flow regulator terminating in at least one distribution aperture for allowing the product within the flow passage to exit the product flow regulator, the product flow regulator further comprising a reservoir for accommodating the product exiting the product flow regulator; wherein the product flow regulator comprises a conduit (28) that defines the flow passage, the conduit comprising a first, open end snugly fitted within the spout of the product container to receive the product exiting the container, and a second end in which the at least one distribution aperture is defined; a bowl portion (38) extending from the conduit, proximate the second end of the conduit, the bowl portion defining the reservoir for accommodating the product exiting the product flow regulator through the at least one distribution aperture, and a dispensing cover (42) overlying the product flow regulator, the dispensing cover defining an elongate distribution slit proximate the reservoir of the product flow regulator, for allowing an elongate product strip to be dispensed, characterized in that the bowl portion is a rectangular bowl portion and that the at least one distribution aperture faces sideways, or downwards towards the base of the bowl portion, thereby ensuring that the reservoir is filled completely before the product is dispensed through the elongate distribution slit.
The product dispenser of claim 1, wherein the reservoir is substantially elongate, and is positioned substantially parallel to the elongate distribution slit of the dispensing cover.

The product dispenser of either claim 1 or claim 2, wherein the product container comprises a spout (18) that defines the container opening, the product flow regulator being securable to the spout of the product container.

The product dispenser of claim 1, wherein the product flow regulator further comprises a skirt (34) extending from the conduit, proximate the first end of the conduit, the skirt and spout comprising complementary securing formations to enable the skirt, and thus the product flow regulator, to be secured to the spout of the product container.

The product dispenser of claim 4, wherein the dispensing cover and the skirt comprise complementary securing formations (38) to enable the dispensing cover to be secured to the product flow regulator.

The product dispenser of claim 1, wherein proximate the elongate distribution slit, the dispensing cover comprises a rectangular guide wall that can be snugly accommodated within the rectangular bowl portion of the product flow regulator, thereby guiding the flow of product from the reservoir through the elongate distribution slit.
The product dispenser of any one of the preceding claims, wherein the product container comprises a flexible wall container such as a tube.
The product dispenser of any one of the preceding claims 1 to 6, wherein the product container may comprise a rigid wall container fitted with a dispensing mechanism.
The product dispenser of any one of the preceding claims, wherein the product dispenser comprises a cap (52) that is releasably fittable to the dispensing cover.

Distributeur de produit (10) pour distribuer une bande de produit allongée (12), le distributeur de produit comprenant : un récipient de produit (14) pour stocker le produit à distribuer, le récipient définissant une ouverture à travers laquelle le produit peut sortir du récipient ; un régulateur d'écoulement de produit (22) à proximité de l'ouverture du récipient, le régulateur d'écoulement de produit comprenant un passage d'écoulement qui est en communication avec le récipient de produit, le passage d'écoulement recevant le produit sortant du récipient, le régulateur d'écoulement de produit se terminant par au moins une ouverture de distribution pour permettre au produit qui se trouve à l'intérieur du passage d'écoulement de sortir du régulateur d'écoulement de produit, le régulateur d'écoulement de produit comprenant en outre un réservoir pour recevoir le produit sortant du régulateur d'écoulement de produit ; dans lequel le régulateur d'écoulement de produit comprend : un conduit (28) qui définit le passage d'écoulement, le conduit comprenant une première extrémité ouverte parfaitement ajustée dans le bec du récipient de produit pour recevoir le produit sortant du récipient, et une seconde extrémité dans laquelle la au moins une ouverture de distribution est définie ; une partie de bol (38) s'étendant du conduit à proximité de la seconde extrémité du conduit, la partie de bol définissant le réservoir pour recevoir le produit sortant du régulateur d'écoulement de produit à travers la au moins une ouverture de distribution, et un couvercle de distribution (42) couvrant le régulateur d'écoulement de produit, le couvercle de distribution définissant une fente de distribution allongée à proximité du réservoir du régulateur d'écoulement de produit pour permettre la distribution d'une bande de produits allongée, caractérisé en ce que la partie de bol est une partie de bol rectangulaire et en ce que la au moins une ouverture de distribution est tournée latéralement ou vers le bas en direction de la base de la partie de bol, garantissant ainsi que le réservoir sera complètement rempli avant que le produit ne soit distribué à travers la fente de distribution allongée.

Distributeur de produit selon la revendication 1, dans lequel le réservoir est sensiblement allongé et est positionné sensiblement parallèlement à la fente de distribution allongée du couvercle de distribution.

Distributeur de produit selon la revendication 1 ou la revendication 2, dans lequel le récipient de produit comprend un bec (18) qui définit l'ouverture du récipient, le régulateur d'écoulement de produit pouvant être fixé au bec du récipient de produit.

Distributeur de produit selon la revendication 1, dans lequel le régulateur d'écoulement de produit comprend en outre une jupe (34) s'étendant depuis le conduit à proximité de la première extrémité du conduit, la jupe et le bec comprenant des formations de fixation complémentaires pour permettre de fixer la jupe et, par conséquent, le régulateur d'écoulement de produit au bec du récipient de produit.

Distributeur de produit selon la revendication 4, dans lequel le couvercle de distribution et la jupe comprennent des formations de fixation complémentaires (38) pour pouvoir fixer le couvercle de distribution au régulateur d'écoulement de produit.

Distributeur de produit selon la revendication 1, dans lequel, à proximité de la fente de distribution allongée, le couvercle de distribution comprend une paroi de guidage rectangulaire qui peut être parfaitement logée dans la partie de bol rectangulaire du régulateur d'écoulement de produit, guidant de la sorte l'écoulement de produit depuis le réservoir à travers la fente de distribution allongée.
Distributeur de produit selon l'une quelconque des revendications précédentes, dans lequel le récipient de produit comprend un récipient à paroi souple, tel qu'un tube.
Distributeur de produit selon l'une quelconque des revendications 1 à 6, dans lequel le récipient de produit peut comprendre un récipient à paroi rigide pourvu d'un mécanisme de distribution.

Distributeur de produit selon l'une quelconque des revendications précédentes, dans lequel le distributeur de produit comprend un bouchon (52) qui peut être ajusté de manière amovible sur le couvercle de distribution.
